text: Porukkuc cellat tankalukku vakanam tevaippattu um'mitam vantavarkalitam"unkalai nan erri vitakkutiya vakanankal ennitam illaiye" enru nir kuriya potu, (porukkakat) tankale celavu ceytu kolla vacatiyillaiye enru ennit tukkattal tankalin kankalil kannir vatittavarkalakat tirumpic cenru vittarkale avarkal mitum (porukkuc cellatatu parri) evvita kurramum illai
